app.description:
Caldav is a protocol that allows different clients/servers to access scheduling information on remote servers as well as schedule meetings with other users on the same server or other servers.
It extends WebDAV specification and uses iCalendar format for the data.

toast.failedToFetchCalendarsDescription: Failed to fetch calendars from {serverUrl}. Please check if the server URL is correct and if the server is reachable.

calendarName.max: Calendar name must be no more than 256 characters

serverUrl.url: Server URL must be a valid URL
serverUrl.max: Server URL must be no more than 4096 characters

username.max: Username must be no more than 256 characters

password.max: Password must be no more than 256 characters
